member.name: T:Ocf.OcfApi
member.summary: Class OcfApi

member.name: M:Ocf.OcfApi.CreateOcfEmbeddedComClient(System.String,Ocf.Embedded.SerialDataBaudRate,System.Int32,Ocf.Embedded.SerialDataLength,System.IO.Ports.Handshake,System.IO.Ports.Parity,System.IO.Ports.StopBits)
member.summary: Creates a Ocf embedded client with COM transfer. An ocf client allows to connect to a remote data model and invoke dynamically properties and methods.
member.param: The rate of the port COM.
member.returns: A dynamic representing the remote model

member.name: M:Ocf.OcfApi.CreateOcfEmbeddedUdpClient(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a OCF embedded client with UDP transfert. An ocf client allows to connect to a remote data model and invoke dynamically properties and methods.
member.returns: A dynamic representing the remote model

member.name: M:Ocf.OcfApi.CreateOcfWcfClient(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates the OCF-WCF client for connexion to .Net applications. An ocf client allows to connect to a remote data model and invoke dynamically properties and methods.
member.returns: A dynamic representing the remote model

member.name: M:Ocf.OcfApi.CreateOcfAdsClient(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a OCF-ADS client for connexion to Beckhoff PLC. An ocf client allows to connect to a remote data model and invoke dynamically properties and methods.
member.returns: A dynamic representing the remote model
